thread.title: Xi to visit Manchester City's Etihad Stadium
thread.title_full: Xi to visit Manchester City's Etihad Stadium

title: Xi to visit Manchester City's Etihad Stadium
text:
Xi to visit Manchester City's Etihad Stadium 
  
For the last leg of the president's UK visit, he will head to the famous football city of Manchester in the northwest of England. 
Interestingly, the lifelong Manchester United fan has opted to tour the home of the Red Devil's arch rival, Manchester City's Etihad Stadium. He will be accompanied by   Cameron and the pair will watch a women's team from China to take on the City. 
Later President Xi is scheduled to visit the University of Manchester, and attend an event at the Manchester Airport before heading back to Beijing. Related Videos
